spell_tooltip.description: Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 591,075, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 10% faster.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Hover increases your movement speed by 70% for the first 4 sec.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 324,510 upon removing any effect.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by 40%.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your healing done and healing received are increased by 12%.
Your Leech is increased by 2%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 4%.
Your Stamina is increased by 6%.
Hover lasts 2 sec longer.
Emerald Blossom heals 2 additional allies.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 147,297 when cast.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Green spells restore 10% more health.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Wrap an ally with temporal energy, healing them for 257,101 and causing your next healing spell to cast an additional time on that ally at 105% of normal healing. Essence spells cannot be Echoed.

Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 30 yd cone in front of you for 867,146.

I:   Heals 117,649 instantly and 749,497 over 16 sec.

II:  Heals 305,023 instantly and 562,122 over 12 sec.

III: Heals 492,398 instantly and 374,748 over 8 sec.

Reverse an ally's injuries, instantly healing them for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec and an additional 350,205 over 15.6 sec.

When Reversion critically heals, its duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each cast of a Bronze spell causes your next empower spell to reach maximum level in 10% less time, stacking up to 4 times.
Living Flame has a 20% chance, and Reversion has a 15% chance to make your next Essence ability free. Stacks 2 times.

Rewind 33% of damage taken in the last 5 seconds by all allies within 40 yds. Always heals for at least 185,363.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Divert spiritual energy, healing an ally for 1 million. Jumps to injured allies within 30 yds when empowered.

I:   Heals one ally.

II:  Heals a second ally.

III: Heals a third ally.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Stretch time around an ally for the next 10.4 sec, causing 50% of damage they would take to instead be dealt over 10.4 sec.

Commune with the Emerald Dream, restoring 20% health and 2% mana every 0.8 sec for 4.1 sec. Overhealing is transferred to an injured ally within 40 yds.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.
Spiritbloom's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1.
Reversion instantly heals the target for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec.
Send forward a vortex of temporal energy, absorbing 129,804 damage on you and any allies in its path. Absorption is reduced beyond 5 targets.
You are able to move while communing with the Dream.
Echo replicates 50% more healing.
Empower spells cause time to flow 10% faster for you, increasing movement speed, cooldown recharge rate, and cast speed. Lasts 10 sec.
Temporal Anomaly applies Echo at 30% effectiveness to the first 5 allies it passes through.
Verdant Embrace increases the healing of your next Dream Breath by 40%, or your next Living Flame by 100%.
Verdant Embrace temporarily bonds your life with an ally, causing your healing on either partner to heal the other for 40% of the amount. Lasts 5 sec.
Consuming a full Temporal Compression grants you Essence Burst.
Rewind's cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Dream Breath healing is increased by 60%.
Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 60% longer and cost 60% less mana.

Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, healing all allies in your path for 282,811 immediately, and 214,724 over 15 sec.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.
Causes your next 3 helpful spells to be duplicated and stored in a time lock. You may reactivate Stasis any time within 30 sec to quickly unleash their magic.
Engulf your target in dragonflame, damaging them for 556,570 Fire or healing them for 655,607. For each of your periodic effects on the target, effectiveness is increased by 50%.
Hover, Deep Breath, and Dream Flight travel 40% faster, and Hover travels 40% further.
Engulf reduces the cooldown of Fire Breath and Dream Breath by 6 sec.
Fire Breath's damage over time is increased by 30%. Dream Breath's heal over time is increased by 30%.
Critical strike chance against targets above 50% health increased by 15%.
Engulf quickens your pulse, reducing the cast time of your next spell by 30%. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Fire Breath and Dream Breath deal their damage and healing in 20% less time.
Living Flame has 1 extra chance to trigger Essence Burst when it critically strikes.
Engulf gains 1 additional charge and deals 20% increased damage and healing.
Renewing Blaze also applies to your target or 1 nearby injured ally at 50% value.
Engulf consumes 2 sec of Dream Breath from the target, detonating it and healing all nearby targets equal to 300% of the amount consumed, reduced beyond 5 targets.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 591,075, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 10% faster.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 208,853. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Hover increases your movement speed by 70% for the first 4 sec.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 324,510 upon removing any effect.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by 40%.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your healing done and healing received are increased by 12%.
Your Leech is increased by 2%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 4%.
Your Stamina is increased by 6%.
Emerald Blossom heals 2 additional allies.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 147,297 when cast.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Green spells restore 10% more health.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to 30% of your maximum health for 5 sec.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Wrap an ally with temporal energy, healing them for 257,101 and causing your next healing spell to cast an additional time on that ally at 105% of normal healing. Essence spells cannot be Echoed.

Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 30 yd cone in front of you for 867,146.

I:   Heals 117,649 instantly and 749,497 over 16 sec.

II:  Heals 305,023 instantly and 562,122 over 12 sec.

III: Heals 492,398 instantly and 374,748 over 8 sec.

When Reversion critically heals, its duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.

I:   Heals one ally.

II:  Heals a second ally.

III: Heals a third ally.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.
Spiritbloom's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1.
Reversion instantly heals the target for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec.
Send forward a vortex of temporal energy, absorbing 129,804 damage on you and any allies in its path. Absorption is reduced beyond 5 targets.
Emerald Communion increases your maximum health by 20% for 15 sec.
Echo replicates 50% more healing.
Temporal Anomaly applies Echo at 30% effectiveness to the first 5 allies it passes through.
Verdant Embrace increases the healing of your next Dream Breath by 40%, or your next Living Flame by 100%.
Verdant Embrace temporarily bonds your life with an ally, causing your healing on either partner to heal the other for 40% of the amount. Lasts 5 sec.
Consuming a full Temporal Compression grants you Essence Burst.
Rewind's cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Dream Breath healing is increased by 60%.
Living Flame and Fire Breath deal additional damage and healing equal to 2.0% of your maximum health.
Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 60% longer and cost 60% less mana.

Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, healing all allies in your path for 282,811 immediately, and 216,638 over 15 sec.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.
Causes your next 3 helpful spells to be duplicated and stored in a time lock. You may reactivate Stasis any time within 30 sec to quickly unleash their magic.

Hover now causes you to briefly warp out of existence and appear at your destination. Hover's cooldown is also reduced by 5 sec.

Hover continues to allow Evoker spells to be cast while moving.
Tip the Scales overloads you with temporal energy, increasing your haste, movement speed, and cooldown recovery rate by 30%, decreasing over 30 sec.
Spiritbloom heals for an additional 30% over 8 sec.
Warp reduces damage taken by 20%, starting high and reducing over 3 sec.

Casting an empower spell during Temporal Burst causes a nearby ally to gain a Thread of Fate for 10 sec, granting them a chance to echo their damage or healing spells, dealing 15% of the amount again.
For each healing over time effect from Spiritbloom, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
When Dream Breath or Fire Breath critically strike, their duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each time you cast an empower spell, unstable time magic reduces its cooldown by up to 6 sec.
Casting Echo has a 20% chance to cause your next Echo to be 100% more effective.
Empower spells send up to 3 Chrono Flames to your targets.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.

The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 147,297 when cast.
Let out a bone-shaking roar at enemies in a cone in front of you, increasing the duration of crowd controls that affect them by 50% in the next 10 sec.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Green spells restore 10% more health.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Oppressing Roar removes 1 Enrage effect from each enemy, and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.

Reversion has 2 charges.
Fire Breath heals 5 nearby injured allies for 80% of damage done to up to 5 targets, split evenly among them.

When you or an ally fall below 30% health, a version of yourself enters your timeline and heals them for 591,075. Your alternate self continues healing for 8 sec before returning to their timeline.

May only occur once every 60 sec.
Dream Breath healing is increased by 30%.

Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 60% longer and cost 60% less mana.

Warp reduces damage taken by 20%, starting high and reducing over 3 sec.

Casting an empower spell during Temporal Burst causes a nearby ally to gain a Thread of Fate for 10 sec, granting them a chance to echo their damage or healing spells, dealing 15% of the amount again.
For each healing over time effect from Spiritbloom, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
When Dream Breath or Fire Breath critically strike, their duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each time you cast an empower spell, unstable time magic reduces its cooldown by up to 6 sec.
Casting Echo has a 20% chance to cause your next Echo to be 100% more effective.
Empower spells send up to 3 Chrono Flames to your targets.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 591,075, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 208,853. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 324,510 upon removing any effect.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by 40%.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Disorient an enemy for 20 sec, causing them to sleep walk towards you. Damage has a chance to awaken them.
Magic damage taken reduced by 8%.
Your Stamina is increased by 6%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 147,297 when cast.
Let out a bone-shaking roar at enemies in a cone in front of you, increasing the duration of crowd controls that affect them by 50% in the next 10 sec.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to 30% of your maximum health for 5 sec.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing 205,780 Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Azure Strike has a 15% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Pyre's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.

Focus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing 788,358 Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within 25 yds when empowered.

I:   Damages 1 enemy.

II:  Damages 2 enemies.

III: Damages 3 enemies.

Erupt with draconic fury and exhale Pyres at 3 enemies within 25 yds.

For 18 sec, Essence Burst's chance to occur is increased to 100%.
Deep Breath's damage is increased by 20%.
Disintegrate deals 16% more damage.
Casting an empower spell extends the duration of Dragonrage by 5 sec, up to a maximum of 20 sec.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Fire Breath deals 30% more damage.
Eternity Surge and Shattering Star hit twice as many targets.
Eternity Surge's cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While channeling Disintegrate your Fire Breath on the target deals damage 100% more often.
During Deep Breath and Dragonrage you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Your Blue damage increases the damage of your next Pyre by 5%, stacking 20 times.
Exhale a bolt of concentrated power from your mouth for 223,158 Spellfrost damage that cracks the target's defenses, increasing the damage they take from you by 20% for 4 sec.
Fire Breath damage has 16% chance to cause your next Living Flame to be instant cast, stacking 2 times.
Deep Breath's cooldown is reduced by 1 min.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 230% damage instead of the usual 200%.
Casting Shattering Star grants Essence Burst.
Essence Burst increases the damage of affected spells by 15.0%.
Disintegrate ticks 1 additional time, but deals 10% less damage.
Casting an empower spell increases your Essence regeneration rate by 100% for 4 sec.

Disintegrate reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.50 sec each time it deals damage.

Pyre reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.40 sec per enemy struck, up to 2.0 sec.
Disintegrate has a 15% chance each time it deals damage to launch a level 1 Eternity Surge at 40% power.
Casting an empower spell increases the damage of your next 2 spells of the same color by 20% within 10 sec.
Black spells deal 20% increased damage.

Mass Eruption marks your primary target for destruction for the next 6 sec.

You and your allies have a chance to trigger a Bombardment when attacking marked targets, dealing 366,418 Volcanic damage split amongst all nearby enemies.
Entering combat grants a charge of Burnout, causing your next Living Flame to cast instantly.
Deep Breath causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from Bombardments and Essence abilities for 12 sec.
Bombardments reduce the cooldown of Breath of Eons by 1 sec for each target struck, up to 3 sec.
For each second you are in combat, Azure Strike, Living Flame, and Eruption deal 1% increased damage, up to 15%.
Obsidian Scales reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Essence abilities extend Bombardments by 1 sec.
While Hovering, damage taken from area of effect attacks is reduced by 10%.

Deep Breath can now be steered in your desired direction.
